name: TAMA (Patrik Collective)
description:
Tama means « ball » in Japanese and « darkness » in Croatian. You are a ball, trying to escape from a deep cave. 

But to do so, you’ll have to learn how to make use of dying, to open the doors leading to the next room.

Tama is our first game, made for the "newbies game jam 2022-2" (which theme was Death = progress). 

Gameplay, visuals, sound and music by Patrik Collective

More on us and our work: Patrik Official Website
